statements: SELECT * FROM MatchResults;
SELECT match_id, winning_team, losing_team FROM MatchResults;
SELECT winning_team, losing_team, winning_score FROM MatchResults WHERE winning_score > 5;
SELECT losing_team, game_duration FROM MatchResults WHERE losing_score < 3;
SELECT * FROM MatchResults ORDER BY game_duration DESC, winning_score ASC;
SELECT match_id, winning_team, losing_team, winning_score, losing_score, game_duration FROM MatchResults WHERE winning_score > losing_score ORDER BY game_duration DESC
SELECT * FROM MatchResults WHERE winning_score < losing_score ORDER BY winning_score ASC
SELECT match_id, winning_team, losing_team FROM MatchResults WHERE losing_score > 5 AND winning_score < 10
SELECT losing_team, losing_score FROM MatchResults WHERE winning_score BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY losing_score DESC
SELECT winning_team, winning_score, losing_score FROM MatchResults WHERE winning_score = 40
SELECT * FROM match_results WHERE winning_team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM teams WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT losing_team_id, losing_team_score FROM match_results WHERE match_id = 10;
SELECT winning_team_id, winning_team_score, game_duration FROM match_results WHERE losing_team_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM teams ORDER BY team_location DESC, team_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM match_results WHERE winning_team_score > 100 ORDER BY match_id DESC;
SELECT match_id, team_name FROM match_results JOIN teams ON winning_team_id = team_id ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT winning_team_id, losing_team_id, winning_team_score, losing_team_score FROM match_results WHERE game_duration > '1 hour' AND losing_team_score < 50;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM teams WHERE team_location = 'New York' OR team_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT team_name, winning_team_score, losing_team_score FROM match_results JOIN teams ON winning_team_id = team_id AND losing_team_score < 70 ORDER BY winning_team_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM WinningTeams;
SELECT team_name, score FROM LosingTeams;
SELECT id, team_name, score FROM WinningTeams WHERE score > 50;
SELECT team_name, score FROM LosingTeams ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT id, team_name, score FROM WinningTeams WHERE team_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM WinningTeams ORDER BY team_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT team_name, score FROM LosingTeams WHERE score > 50;
SELECT winning_team_id, losing_team_id, game_duration FROM MatchResults WHERE game_duration BETWEEN '1 hour' AND '2 hours';
SELECT team_name FROM WinningTeams UNION SELECT team_name FROM LosingTeams ORDER BY team_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_matches FROM MatchResults;
SELECT * FROM winning_teams;
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM losing_teams;
SELECT match_id, winning_team_id, losing_team_id, score FROM match_results ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT game_name, match_date FROM game_info WHERE match_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name AS winner, game_duration FROM match_results INNER JOIN winning_teams ON match_results.winning_team_id = winning_teams.team_id;
SELECT * FROM winning_teams;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM losing_teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;

SELECT m.match_id, g.game_name, w.team_name AS winning_team, l.team_name AS losing_team FROM match_results m JOIN winning_teams w ON m.winning_team_id = w.team_id JOIN losing_teams l ON m.losing_team_id = l.team_id WHERE m.score > 5;
SELECT g.game_name, m.score, m.game_duration FROM match_results m JOIN game_info g ON m.match_id = g.game_id WHERE m.score BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY m.score DESC, m.game_duration ASC;

SELECT g.match_date, w.team_name AS winning_team, l.team_name AS losing_team FROM match_results m JOIN game_info g ON m.match_id = g.game_id JOIN winning_teams w ON m.winning_team_id = w.team_id JOIN losing_teams l ON m.losing_team_id = l.team_id WHERE g.match_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WinningTeams;
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM LosingTeams;
SELECT match_id, winning_team_id, losing_team_id, score, game_duration FROM MatchResults WHERE score > 100;
SELECT * FROM GameStats WHERE total_scores < 50;
SELECT player_name, player_team_id FROM PlayerStats WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM WinningTeams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM LosingTeams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM WinningTeams WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT match_id, winning_team_id, losing_team_id, score FROM MatchResults WHERE match_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_team_id FROM PlayerStats WHERE player_team_id = 3 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
